name: CIS_EKS_v1.1.0 - 3.1.4
title: Ensure that the kubelet configuration file ownership is set to root:root
script:
file_path=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-config=[^ ]*' | cut -d= -f2)
if [ -z $file_path ]; then
  file_path=$(ps -ef | grep kubelet | grep -o '\-\-config [^ ]*' | cut -d' ' -f2)
  if [ -z $file_path ]; then
    echo "Config File Not Found"
    exit 1
  fi
fi

if [ -f $file_path ]; then
  owner=$(stat -c %U:%G $file_path)
  if [ $owner == "root:root" ]; then
    exit 0
  else
    echo "EKS CIS 3.1.4 -  Ensure that the controller manager pod specification file ownership are set to root:root."
    exit 1
  fi
fi
